title: Rookies Poster (SCP Animation)
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

So I've been working on an animated SCP Foundation series called, "Rookies." It's about a group of clone recruits who cause havoc at the Foundation. The first episode drops January 1, 2024, at 2:00 pm (YouTube channel is [*https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9MgLIExevJZ-pLMKjGCGGg SCP Puppets]).

Here is a link to the first episode:

[*https://youtu.be/hDy0Gw1l_G0 Send in the Clones | Rookies - Episode 1 (SCP Animation)]

And here's a poster I made for the series (with a little nod to SCP-008):

[[<image Rookies_Poster_001a_test.jpg]]
author: fifty3dragons
